item.title: By: Simon
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description: <p>Hi Matthew - I am truly jealous of your jet-set lifestyle! Fi & I had such a wonderful time in San Francisco. If you get the chance, go and have lunch at a place called the Cannery on the very unfashionable Fisherman's Wharf (just before Gherardelli's (?) - it's a comedy club at night too I think. All is well here in Nottm - the Bank Holiday was very relaxing. Take care Si</p>
item.content:encoded: Hi Matthew – I am truly jealous of your jet-set lifestyle! Fi & I had such a wonderful time in San Francisco. If you get the chance, go and have lunch at a place called the Cannery on the very unfashionable Fisherman’s Wharf (just before Gherardelli’s (?) – it’s a comedy club at night too I think. All is well here in Nottm – the Bank Holiday was very relaxing. Take care Si
